title: DocuSign CLM
content:
As noted in the rationale behind transitioning to DocuSign , and desired DocuSign functionality , Simplifi uses DocuSign Contract Lifecycle Management to ensure centralized, streamline process for any vendor contracts and client contracts. There are thus two use cases for the DocuSign CLM: of new software applications or vendors to be used at the enterprise level. This would include: Contracts Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreements Data Processing Agreements Master Service Agreements Sales pipeline management Insertion Orders The former is exclusively managed within DocuSign CLM workflows, which generate tasks for approval by needed teams (Business Development, Finance, Security, Digital Workplace) and authorized departmental buyers. The latter (sales use case) is managed through an integration with DocuSign CLM and Salesforce DocuSign App Launcher. It is specifically targeted at new insertion orders.
